name: X4 2022 Bundle
description:
The X4 2022 Bundle brings together the X4: Foundations base game and its expansions and soundtracks in one collection. It gives you an additional discount on the purchase, and the package is rounded off with some bonus material. Dive into the X4 space sandbox and tell your own story!

The X4 2022 Bundle includes:
- X4: Foundations
- The X Universe Digital Artbook 2018: Enjoy the concept art behind the X universe.
- X Novel: Nopileos by Helge Kautz as English and German eBook.
- Digital Soundtrack: Download the music, including exclusive versions of the trailer and teaser music in highest possible quality, for X4: Foundations, X4: Split Vendetta, X4: Cradle of Humanity and X4: Tides of Avarice.
- X Encyclopedia

Access to expansions for X4: Foundations:
- X4: Split Vendetta (2020)
- X4: Cradle of Humanity (2021)
- X4: Tides of Avarice (2022)
